<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>You mean to say...<sp:5:0:0> You already found it?

the floating fish-shaped island...
Createshinguard_1090: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Enough tomfoolery!<sp:5:1:0> I will not allow it!
Createshinguard_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_00>Y-yes, that is so...


I desperately searched the river for the
fish that ate the <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>but I returned
empty-handed.
Createshinguard_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You witnessed something unseemly.<sp:5:1:0>
Worry not, I intend to give Chroma a
stern warning.
Sir Link...<sp:5:1:0> If you so please, will you speak
with <clr:0000>Queen<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Yona<clr:ffff>?

Helm aside, <clr:0000>Queen Yona<clr:ffff> is earnestly
trying to repair your <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>As you are aware, the <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff> should
prove quite useful on your journey.
Createshinguard_1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Understood, Chroma?


Queen Yona originally intended to search
for Sir Link's <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff> herself to present
to him in gratitude.
But someone insisted that she hand off
the task. "Leave it to me," that Zora said.
Who was it? Was it not...<sp:5:1:0>you, Chroma?
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Look... I understand being moved by
Queen Yona's kind spirit and the domain's
gratitude for Sir Link.
In truth, I have full faith in you and your
own kind spirit. That is why I am so hard
on you.
Createshinguard_1101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You witnessed something unseemly...<sp:5:1:0>
Worry not, I intend to give Chroma a
stern warning.
Sir Link...<sp:5:1:0> If you so please, will you speak
with <clr:0000>Queen<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Yona<clr:ffff>?

Helm aside, <clr:0000>Queen<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Yona<clr:ffff> is earnestly
seeking some <clr:0000>Zora greaves<clr:ffff> for you.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>As you are well aware, the <clr:0000>Zora greaves<clr:ffff>
should prove quite useful on your journey.
Createshinguard_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Perhaps that is because you were so absorbed in
lecturing me...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Createshinguard_1055_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> Why do I feel <sp:5:0:0>as though I am
overlooking something...
Createshinguard_1081:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>This was intended to be our opportunity
to honor Sir Link for his contributions.
Instead, we caused trouble for him.
<snd:Angry_00>We have much to be sorry for! And yet...<sp:5:1:0>
There it is. That inexplicable smirk upon
your face!
It seems it again falls on me to instruct
you in proper conduct for an attendant.
Listen carefully...
Createshinguard_1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>Pure silliness. It is unlikely that the
<clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff> was placed in an actual
fish's stomach.
I suspect you should be thinking of the
<clr:0000>sky fish <clr:ffff>as a metaphor <sp:5:0:0>leading to the
place where the helm is <clr:0000>hidden<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>You never listen closely to my guidance,
which often results in these ridiculous
misunderstandings.
Createshinguard_1070:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>You mean to say...<sp:5:0:0> You already found the
Zora helm?

To think that it was hidden in the floating
fish-shaped island...
Createshinguard_1070_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wait a moment...<sp:5:0:0> Huh?!<sp:5:1:0>


Sir Link! That thing upon your head...<sp:5:0:0>
Is that not the <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff>?!
Createshinguard_1085:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>No...<sp:5:1:0> It cannot be! I was so sure the
lectures would finally end!
Createshinguard_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>Honestly!<sp:5:0:0> And the reason for that is your
lack of progress in the tasks you have
been entrusted with!
The <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff> we are to present to
Sir Link seems to be <clr:0000>stored in a sky fish<clr:ffff>...

<snd:Angry_01>Queen Yona kindly provided you with that
helpful information, yet you have done
nothing with it!
Createshinguard_1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>The Zora helm previously used in battle
was damaged beyond repair.

That means the information Queen Yona
found is the only key we have to repaying
our immense debt to Sir Link...
Createshinguard_1070_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>To think it was hidden on a fish-shaped
island floating up in the sky...
Createshinguard_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>In summation, and to repeat myself, as an
attendant of Queen Yona, it is paramount
to demonstrate more self-awareness...
At all times and in every circumstance,
you must behave in a way that is in no
danger of reflecting poorly on her...
Createshinguard_1075:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>So! The Zora helm was up in the sky!<sp:5:0:0>
Meaning it was impossible for us to find
it from the start.
Thanks to you, Sir Link, our goal was
achieved, same as though we had
retrieved the helm for you ourselves.
Perhaps this means that Khira's lengthy
lectures will finally come to an end...
Createshinguard_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> Sir Link!<sp:5:1:0> Wherever are my manners?


I was not quick to notice you had graced
us with your presence. I am terribly sorry.
Createshinguard_1050:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Ugh... She keeps repeating prior lectures.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I was told that the <clr:0000>Zora helm<clr:ffff> is "stored in
the <clr:0000>sky fish<clr:ffff>"...

<snd:Think_00>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> <clr:0000>Sky fish<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> Fish...<sp:5:0:0> F-I-S-H...<sp:5:1:0> Oof, all of this
fish talk is making me famished.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Createshinguard_1065:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> It is you! <sp:5:0:0>Sir Link!<sp:5:0:0> Is there something
